text:
[Verse]
Golden skies above the sea
Whispers of the evening breeze
Feel the magic while we dream
Everything is as it seems

[Verse 2]
Colors floating in our eyes
Purple clouds in twilight skies
Holding hands we chase the night
Stars are singing pure delight

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams and moonlit beams
In this twilight time it seems
Moments frozen pure and bright
In the magic of the night

[Verse 3]
Waves are dancing at our feet
Rhythms of the ocean sweet
In your eyes I see the shine
Lost in love your heart in mine

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams and moonlit beams
In this twilight time it seems
Moments frozen pure and bright
In the magic of the night

[Bridge]
Every color every hue
Painting skies with shades of blue
Here with you it's all we need
In this moment hearts are freed
title: Sunset Dreams
